long_description: The lightweight Buck Bantam BKS 285 Knife offers easy handling for any standard task. 420HC stainless-steel blade features a fine edge. Mid-lockback design and thumb stud offers easy one-handed opening and rock-solid stability. Textured, thermoplastic handle with ridges at the top for added grip. The Buck Bantam BKS 285 Knife features a lanyard hole for easy attachment.
short_description: The lightweight Buck Bantam BKS 285 Knife offers easy handling for any standard task.
